tools.name: BLACKBAUD_ONE_ROSTER_O_AUTH2_BASE_API
tools.description: Tool to interact with Blackbaud OneRoster OAuth2 base endpoints. Use to fetch OpenID configuration (/.well-known/openid-configuration), JWKS key set (publickeys), or obtain an access token via the client credentials grant. Ensure client credentials are configured before using the token operation.

inputSchema.title: OneRosterOAuth2BaseApiRequest

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Optional OAuth2 scope string. OneRoster generally does not require a scope; leave empty unless instructed by Blackbaud.

clientId.title: Client Id
clientId.description: OneRoster OAuth2 client_id (key) provided by the institution.

basicAuth.title: Basic Auth
basicAuth.description: Optional Authorization header value for HTTP Basic authentication, e.g., 'Basic base64(client_id:client_secret)'. If provided, it will be used.

grantType.title: Grant Type
grantType.description: OAuth2 grant type; must be 'client_credentials' for token operation.

operation.title: Operation
operation.description: Which OAuth2 resource to call: openid_configuration, jwks, or token

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: OneRoster OAuth2 client_secret provided by the institution.

baseUrlOverride.title: Base Url Override
baseUrlOverride.description: Optional override for OAuth2 server base URL. Defaults to 'https://oauth2.sky.blackbaud.com'.

inputSchema.description:
Base API request for interacting with Blackbaud OAuth2 (OneRoster).

Supports multiple operations to allow thorough testing without client credentials:
- operation = "openid_configuration": GET the OpenID Connect discovery document.
- operation = "jwks": GET the JSON Web Key Set used to validate tokens.
- operation = "token": POST to the token endpoint using client credentials grant.

When operation="token", provide either:
  - client_id and client_secret (will be encoded as HTTP Basic automatically), or
  - basic_auth (prebuilt header value: "Basic base64(client_id:client_secret)").
